arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} When your {c_important}Conjuration{/c} Skills hit you have up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}+[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Rank to your {c_important}Conjuration{/c} skills for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.  This can stack up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} times.
